23andMe has filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection, and its co-founder Anne Wojcicki has resigned, making an independent bid to buy the company herself. Despite claims that customer data access won’t be affected, Linus questions whether users' genetic information is truly safe. What would you do if you owned 23andMe?

Watch the full WAN Show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nRyI3y4o9eM

Troy Hunt, creator of Have I Been Pwned and a Microsoft Regional Director, was himself phished through a fake Mailchimp email. The attack compromised around 16,000 email addresses. Linus and Luke discuss why even experts can fall for phishing scams and how normalizing these mistakes can help raise awareness.

Watch the full WAN Show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nRyI3y4o9eM
